Monitor Oriented Design¶

Basic Constructs¶

cereal.monitor provides monitoring ability for Cereal.

class cereal.monitor.MonitorBase(url=None, bot_chat_id=None, bot_token='Talk to https://telegram.me/botfather to get one!')[source]¶

Base Class for monitor used as monitoring agent.

It can be used to create a monitor for vsys address or ip, using pandas to process data.

bot_token¶

Telegram chatbot token.

url¶

VSYS full node url with which to get info.

bot_chat_id¶

Telegram chatid to send messages to.

Monitor Manipulations¶

cereal.monitor.monitor provides monitoring ability for Cereal.

class cereal.monitor.monitor.Monitor(url, bot_chat_id, bot_token, address, ip, bot=False, chain_id='M')[source]¶

Class for monitoring.

It can be used to create a monitor for vsys address or ip, using pandas to process data.

bot_token¶

Telegram chatbot token.

url¶

VSYS full node url with which to get info.

bot_chat_id¶

Telegram chatid to send messages to.

address_monitor(address=None)[source]¶

Monitor for addresses on VSYS chain.

Parameters

address – list of address to be monitored

Returns

ip_monitor(ip=None)[source]¶

Monitor for ips of VSYS nodes.

Parameters

ip – ip to be monitored

Returns
